item.title: Why DraftKings is betting on a subscription service that gives members improved odds

item.title: Nvidia nears high, chip stocks soar after Foxconn reports record revenue

item.title: Congress set to certify Trump's election victory on anniversary of 2021 Capitol riot
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump won the 2024 election against Vice President Kamala Harris, who will preside over Congress as it certifies the results.

item.description: Surgeon General Vivek Murthy recommended that labels on alcoholic beverages be updated to include a warning about cancer risk.
